column5: Come vacation at the Cypress Point Estate on Lake Murvaul. Enjoy:  Open kitchen-dining space with sweeping lake views Porches galore! 2 master bdrms w/ private verandas 2 guest bdrms Billiards, swings, hammocks, docks, a canoe, a row boat, a paddle board and more!
column8: Cypress Point Lakehouse on Lake Murvaul
